alert.note: Alert for La Porte; Marshall; St. Joseph; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 8:14AM EDT until April 05 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern St. Joseph County in north central Indiana... Starke County in northwestern Indiana... Northwestern Marshall County in north central Indiana... Central La Porte County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 900 AM EDT/800 AM CDT/. * At 814 AM EDT/714 AM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over North Judson, or 8 miles west of Knox, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... La Porte, Knox, Walkerton, North Liberty, North Judson, Kingsford Heights, Hamlet, Lakeville, La Crosse, Koontz Lake, Hanna, Kingsbury, Lomax, Teegarden, English Lake, Salem Heights, Fish Lake, Brems, Stillwell and San Pierre. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: La Porte; Marshall; St. Joseph; Starke
